text: Live at the Sahara Tahoe is the first live album by American soul musician Isaac Hayes. The album, recorded live at the Sahara Hotel & Casino in Lake Tahoe, Nevada, was released in 1973, by Stax Records' Enterprise imprint. == Track listing == ==References== Category:Isaac Hayes live albums Category:1973 live albums Category:Stax Records live albums
title: Live at the Sahara Tahoe
